message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. We believe it would greatly benefit your business operations. Our initial offer for this exceptional product is $950,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I agree the product is valuable, but I need the price to be more realistic.  How about $650,000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. While we appreciate your offer, we feel that the value of the product justifies a higher price. Our counteroffer is $750,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $750,000 is closer, but to make this work I need it to be $700,000.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our counteroffer to $725,000.
Alice, this is getting close.  Can we split the difference and do it for $712,500?
Thank you for your proposal, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our current negotiation, we are willing to accept $715,000 for the product.
